programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.longDescription: Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern star in Julian Fellowes’ hit series, a glittering period drama following the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family.
programme.description: Maggie Smith & Hugh Bonneville star in Julian Fellowes’ hit series

titles.description: Glittering period drama. The family is stunned when Lady Cora finds that she is pregnant.
titles.longDescription: Glittering period drama. The family is astonished when Lady Cora Crawley finds that she is pregnant, and the announcement leaves Mary wondering how to answer Matthew's proposal.

titles.description: Glittering period drama. Sybil's interest in politics gets her in trouble.
titles.longDescription: Glittering period drama. Sybil's interest in politics gets her in trouble, Matthew and Mary's relationship takes an unexpected turn, and Bates makes a shocking revelation.

titles.description: Glittering period drama. Mary is introduced to a potential suitor that she doesn't enjoy.
titles.longDescription: Glittering period drama. Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but she thinks that he is too old and stuffy - meanwhile, Mrs Patmore fears she may be going blind.

titles.description: Glittering period drama. Violet and Isobel are in conflict over a medical ailment.
titles.longDescription: Glittering period drama. Violet and Isobel are in conflict over a medical ailment affecting Molesley, and Carson fears that there is a thief at Downton.

titles.description: Glittering period drama. Mary is instantly attracted to a handsome Turkish attache.
titles.longDescription: Glittering period drama. Mary is instantly attracted to handsome Turkish attache Kemal Pamuk, but their romance is cut brutally short and sends ripples of unease through the house.

titles.description: Glittering period drama. Matthew and his mother Isobel arrive at Downton.
titles.longDescription: Glittering period drama. Matthew and his mother Isobel arrive at Downton, but trouble lies ahead as doctor's widow Isobel immediately finds her views at odds with Violet's.

titles.description: The first episode of the period drama. It is April 1912, and the Titanic has been sunk.
titles.longDescription: The first episode of the glittering period drama. It is April 1912, and news arrives of the sinking of the Titanic with the loss of Downton's heir James and his son Patrick.

titles.description: Period drama series. There is excitement in the air with the wedding approaching.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. There is excitement in the air with the wedding approaching, Spanish flu reaches Downton, and a decisive Anna forces Bates to think about their future.

titles.description: Period drama series. Sybil and Branson attempt to keep their secret.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Sybil and Branson attempt to keep their secret, Carlisle puts Anna in a difficult position, and Bates is left reeling from the news about Vera.

titles.description: Period drama series. Carlisle threatens to ruin Mary if she jilts him.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Carlisle threatens to ruin Mary if she jilts him, a newly-arrived major's identity is questioned, and Bates learns that Vera has scuppered the divorce.

titles.description: Period drama series. Robert receives some shocking news from the front.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Robert receives shocking news from the front, Daisy's relationship with William moves faster than she would like, and Vera threatens to expose old secrets.

titles.description: Period drama series. Ethel's flirtation with Major Bryant lands her in hot water.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Tensions flare between Isobel and Cora, Ethel's flirtation with Major Bryant lands her in hot water, and there is worrying news about Matthew.

titles.description: Period drama series. Matthew brings a general to visit Downton's new convalescent home.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Matthew brings a general to visit Downton's new convalescent home, but Branson has a surprise in store - meanwhile, Lavinia appears to be hiding something.

titles.description: Period drama series. Carson is finding it tough maintaining standards in the house.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Carson is finding it tough maintaining standards in the house, and a suicide prompts Isobel to suggest converting Downton Abbey into a convalescent hospital.

titles.description: Widely-acclaimed drama. The Great War unsettles life at Downton.
titles.longDescription: Widely-acclaimed drama. The Great War unsettles life at Downton as a surprise concerning Matthew rocks the family, a new maid irritates O'Brien, and Bates has devastating news.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. The annual cricket match brings out Robert's competitive side.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. The annual cricket match brings out Robert's competitive side, and Violet's great niece Rose arrives and a trip to London reveals that there is more to her.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. Branson's plans for the christening cause consternation.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. Anna's patience is finally rewarded, Edith has an unexpected admirer, Matthew refuses to back down, and Branson's plans for the christening cause concern.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. Bates goes to extremes as his chance of freedom slips away.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. Tempers fray as Isobel's kind gesture backfires, Branson's decisions are put under scrutiny, and Bates goes to extremes as his chance of freedom slips away.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. An exciting offer for Edith divides opinion.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. An exciting offer for Edith divides opinion, Isobel throws Ethel a lifeline, and Alfred's particular interest in new maid Ivy is resented by Daisy.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. Branson's political views land him in hot water.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. Branson's political views land him in hot water and Sybil's loyalty is tested to the limit, and Ethel is torn between head and heart as she makes a choice.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. Edith's big day finally arrives, but it comes at a price for Mary.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. Edith's big day finally arrives with the family still unconvinced that Strallan's age does not matter, and Mary takes Downton's finances into her own hands.

titles.description: Acclaimed period drama. Mary conspires with Violet to try to ensure the rescue of Downton.
titles.longDescription: Acclaimed period drama. In the hope of financial rescue from her American grandmother, Mary conspires with Violet to make sure Downton puts on a bigger show than ever before.

titles.description: Period drama series. Cora's mother sweeps into Downton for Matthew and Mary's wedding.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series. Cora's mother sweeps into Downton for Matthew and Mary's wedding, but will they even make it to the altar with the couple's relationship under strain?

titles.description: Period drama series about the aristocratic Crawley family. Rosamund comes up with a plan.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series about the aristocratic Crawley family. Rosamund comes up with a plan to help Edith deal with her problem, but Violet may be about to see right through it.

titles.description: Period drama series about the aristocratic Crawley family. Cora's brother is in trouble.
titles.longDescription: Period drama series about the aristocratic Crawley family. Cora's brother is in trouble and Robert goes to America to bail him out, and there are romantic tensions below stairs.

titles.description: Drama series about the Crawley family. A birthday party is planned for Robert.
titles.longDescription: Drama series about the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants. A birthday party is planned for Robert, but Rose's surprise contribution to the event ruffles feathers.

titles.description: Drama series. There is tension between Ivy and Daisy, and Isobel appeals to Violet.
titles.longDescription: Drama series following the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants. There is tension between Ivy and Daisy, and Isobel appeals to Violet's charitable nature.

titles.description: Drama series. Mary faces a pressing question about her future after the house party.
titles.longDescription: Drama series following the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family. Mary faces a pressing question about her future amid the fallout from the eventful house party.

titles.description: Drama series. The Crawleys get a chance to reconnect with old friends at a house party.
titles.guidance: Contains scenes of sexual violence some viewers may find distressing.
titles.longDescription: Drama series about the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants. An extravagant house party at the Abbey gives the Crawleys a chance to reconnect with old friends.

titles.description: Drama series about the lives of the Crawley family. Mary begins to emerge from her grief.
titles.longDescription: Drama series about the lives of the Crawley family and their servants. Mary is beginning to emerge from her grief, Molesley's fortunes worsen, and Lady Rose is out for some fun.

titles.description: Widely acclaimed drama series. Mary is struggling to come to terms with her loss.
titles.longDescription: Widely acclaimed drama series. Mary is struggling to come to terms with her loss following Matthew's death, and hearts seem set to be broken as Jimmy takes an interest in Ivy.

titles.description: Period drama. Tensions between the families of the bride and the groom threaten a big day.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Tensions between the families of the bride and the groom threaten Lady Rose's big day, and the storm clouds gathering over Anna and Bates finally burst.

titles.description: Period drama. Rosamund arrives back following Edith's shock departure.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Rosamund arrives back following Edith's shock departure, Rose is delighted to introduce Atticus and his parents to her family, and Molesley is concerned about Daisy.

titles.description: Period drama. Edith receives some terrible news and decides to take drastic action.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Relations between Robert and Cora are strained after their altercation, and Edith receives some terrible news and decides to take drastic action.

titles.description: Period drama. Inspector Vyner returns with some ominous words of warning for Anna.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Simon Bricker returns to Downton to discuss the painting with Cora, and Inspector Vyner returns with some ominous words of warning for Anna.

titles.description: Lavish period drama. Violet reveals the surprising truth of her past with Prince Kuragin.
titles.longDescription: Lavish period drama. Sarah Bunting continues to cause waves above stairs, and Violet reveals the surprising truth of her past with Prince Kuragin to Isobel.

titles.description: Period drama. Mary's secret assignation is very nearly blown, but Violet saves the day.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Mary's secret assignation is very nearly blown, but Violet's quick thinking saves the day as the events surrounding Green's death come under scrutiny once again.

titles.description: Lavish period drama. Robert is faced with a difficult decision as the house recovers.
titles.longDescription: Lavish period drama. Robert is faced with a difficult decision as the house recovers from the dramatic scenes of the previous night, and Anna becomes Mary's reluctant accomplice.

titles.description: Lavish period drama. It is 1924 as the first-ever Labour government heralds a sea change.
titles.longDescription: Lavish period drama following the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants. It is 1924, and the first-ever Labour government heralds a sea change in the nation.

titles.description: Romance abounds in the final episode, but for some the year's end is bittersweet.
titles.longDescription: Romance abounds in the final episode, but for some the year's end is bittersweet. Mary endeavours to build bridges, but Edith's secret continues to pose a threat.

titles.description: Edith must decide whether to conceal her past at all costs or confront the truth.
titles.longDescription: A change of circumstance puts Bertie Pelham in the limelight, and Edith must decide whether to conceal her past at all costs or confront the truth and risk losing everything.

titles.description: Henry Talbot invites the Crawleys to watch him motor racing at Brooklands.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Henry Talbot invites the Crawleys to watch him motor racing at Brooklands, but events leave Mary reeling. Violet's plan surprises the family and delights Denker.

titles.description: Opinions are divided when Tom and Mary open Downton to the public for a day.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Opinions are divided above and below stairs when Tom and Mary open Downton to the public for a day in aid of the hospital. Carson has an axe to grind with Thomas.

titles.description: Violet schemes to quash plans for the takeover of the hospital.
titles.guidance: Contains some shocking and bloody scenes.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Violet invites the Minister of Health to dine as part of her scheme to quash plans for the takeover of the hospital. The evening proves distressing for everyone.

titles.description: The family and servants are surprised by the return of another old friend.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. As Tom and Sybbie settle back into life at Downton, the family and servants are surprised by the return of another old friend in unexpected circumstances.

titles.description: Preparations for the wedding of Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes are under way.
titles.longDescription: Period drama. Preparations for the wedding of Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes are under way. Edith meets up with an old acquaintance. Spratt has something to hide.

titles.description: Mary's meddling gets Mr Carson into trouble with Mrs Hughes.
titles.longDescription: Lady Mary's meddling gets Mr Carson into trouble with Mrs Hughes. Cora and Violet lock horns over the hospital takeover plans. Robert has a tough decision to make.

titles.description: It is now 1925, when secrets and rifts threaten the unity of the family.
titles.longDescription: It is now 1925, when secrets and rifts threaten the unity of the family, while those below stairs are faced with social changes.

titles.description: The Crawleys are implicated in a scandal that threatens to engulf the monarchy.
titles.longDescription: The family are in residence at their London home, as debutante Rose is to be presented at court, when they are all implicated in a scandal that threatens to engulf the monarchy.

titles.description: Rose's father-in-law invites the Crawleys to a shooting party in Northumberland.
titles.longDescription: Rose's father-in-law, Lord Sinderby, invites the Crawleys to a shooting party in Northumberland, while the servants hold the fort back at Downton.

titles.description: A feature-length special of the acclaimed period drama. The family visit Duneagle Castle.
titles.longDescription: A feature-length special of the acclaimed period drama. The family receive a warm welcome at Duneagle Castle while visiting Rose and her parents, but there is tension in the air.

titles.description: Tensions run high as the family host a lavish Christmas party
titles.longDescription: It's Christmas 1919 and the family host a lavish Christmas party, but tensions are running high, and Bates' arrest has cast a shadow over the festivities.

episode.description: The first episode of the period drama. It is April 1912, and the Titanic has been sunk.
episode.longDescription: The first episode of the glittering period drama. It is April 1912, and news arrives of the sinking of the Titanic with the loss of Downton's heir James and his son Patrick.
